methods.name: byId
javadoc: Gets the game type by it's ID. Will be survival if none was found.

methods.name: byName
javadoc: Gets the game type registered with the specified name. If no matches were found, survival will be returned.

methods.name: getId
javadoc: Returns the ID of this game type

methods.name: getName
javadoc: Returns the name of this game type

methods.name: isBlockPlacingRestricted
javadoc: Returns true if this is the ADVENTURE game type

methods.name: isCreative
javadoc: Returns true if this is the CREATIVE game type

methods.name: isSurvival
javadoc: Returns true if this is the SURVIVAL or ADVENTURE game type

methods.name: updatePlayerAbilities
javadoc: Configures the player capabilities based on the game type
